dempred.featuregeneration

Class Sequence2File

  • java.lang.Object
    • dempred.featuregeneration.Sequence2File

  • public class Sequence2File
extends java.lang.Object
    This feature generator class is used to generate features for string sequences like amino acid or nucleic acid sequences. The features are read from a matrix text file such as a BLOSUM matrix.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sequence2File(java.lang.String filepath)
      Instantiates a new instance and reads in a feature matrix from specified file.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Generate features for an amino acid sequence using the specified matrix.
      java.lang.String[] getFeatureNames()
      Returns the feature names of this matrix file.
      int numFeatures()
      returns the number of generated features for a single amino acid.
      void readFeaturesFromFile(java.lang.String filepath)
      Reads features from a text file.
      java.lang.String toString()
